comment: The damage can be dealt to any target, including planeswalkers.
If the chosen target is an illegal target when Lightning Bolt tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen.

A spell that can't be countered is a legal target for Counterspell. The spell won't be countered when Counterspell resolves, but you'll still draw a card if you control a creature named Baral, Chief of Compliance.
If you activate Jace's first ability and you or the targeted player is shuffling a library as Jace's ability tries to resolve, the ability will have no effect.
If you activate Jace's last ability and the player is shuffling a library as the ability tries to resolve, the ability will have no effect.
